description:
""The Justice Centre for Constitutional Freedoms (jccf.ca) is representing an Edmonton man who was ticketed on April 17, 2020 for “contravening an order of a medical officer of health” while peacefully expressing his opinions on a public sidewalk in Old Strathcona. The amount of the ticket is $1,200."" https://www.jccf.ca/1200-covid-19-ticket-for-peaceful-expression-on-a-public-sidewalk/
